mapper.sql: id, clientId, vehicle, postMan,phone, address, postalCode, remark, createTime
mapper.select: SELECT ali.id, ali.clientId, ali.vehicle, ali.postMan, ali.phone, ali.address, ali.postalCode, ali.remark, ali.createTime, clt.`name` AS client_name, clt.phone AS client_phone FROM ack_logistics ali LEFT JOIN ack_client clt ON ali.clientId = clt.id where ali.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT ali.id, ali.clientId, ali.vehicle, ali.postMan, ali.phone, ali.address, ali.postalCode, ali.remark, ali.createTime, clt.`name` AS client_name, clt.phone AS client_phone FROM ack_logistics ali LEFT JOIN ack_client clt ON ali.clientId = clt.id where ali.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into ack_logistics (id, clientId, vehicle, postMan, phone, address, postalCode, remark, createTime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{clientId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
